```{r, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(Signac)
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
library(qs)
library(circlize)
library(magick)
library(GenomicRanges)
source("AuxFunctions.R")
```

Continue here after VIA pseudotime (associated jupyter notebook)

```{r}
rV2.data <- qread("../scATAC_data/nmm_rV2_subset_relabeled_031023_links.qs",nthreads = 6)
via.pseudot <- read.csv("../scATAC_data/seurat_data/rv2_via_pseudotime_110522.csv")
```

```{r}
via.pseudot.v <- via.pseudot$pseudotime
names(via.pseudot.v) <- via.pseudot$barcode
rV2.data$VIA_pseudotime <- via.pseudot.v
```

```{r Set genes and regions Tal1}
covariate.genes <- c("Tal1","Vsx2","Gad1")
gene.of.interest <- covariate.genes[1]
f1.range <- range(Annotation(rV2.data)[Annotation(rV2.data)$gene_name %in% gene.of.interest], ignore.strand = TRUE)
f2.range <- f1.range+50000
```

```{r}
plots.1 <- plotSmoothedAccessibility(dataset=rV2.data, covariate.genes.to.plot=covariate.genes, region.of.interest=GRangesToString(f2.range))
```

```{r}
pdf(file = str_interp("~/OneDrive - University of Helsinki/E12R1 project/Manuscript I - Regulation of Tal1 dependent rV2 lineage bifurcation/Figures/plots/Fig2/GA_${gene.of.interest}_prox_peaks_heatmap.pdf"), width = 28, height = 24)
print(plots.1[[1]])
dev.off()

pdf(file = str_interp("~/OneDrive - University of Helsinki/E12R1 project/Manuscript I - Regulation of Tal1 dependent rV2 lineage bifurcation/Figures/plots/Fig2/GL_${gene.of.interest}_prox_peaks_heatmap.pdf"), width = 28, height = 24)
print(plots.1[[2]])
dev.off()
```
